sen.j: 存如（ぞんにょ 1396年（応永3年）－1457年7月9日（長禄元年6月18日 (旧暦)））は、室町時代の浄土真宗の僧で、本願寺第7世。
sen.e: Zonnyo (1396 to July 9, 1457) was a priest of the Jodoshin Sect in the Muromachi period, and the 7th head priest of the Hongan-ji Temple.

sen.e: Zonnyo was born to the eldest son of Gyonyo, the 6th head priest of the Hongan-ji Temple, and became a yushi of Kanenobu HIROHASHI under a Japanese old adoption system.
